# About
This is the repository for the Bayesian Analysis course at the University of Sussex 2019/2020.

Launch binder to access the interactive notebooks.

<a href="https://mybinder.org/v2/gh/ljcolling/arm-env/master?urlpath=git-pull?repo=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fljcolling%2Fnotebooks%26%25filepath=notebooks%2FTableOfContents.ipynb%26%3Bbranch=master"><img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," alt="Binder" /></a></p>

Or access the coursebook at [bayes.colling.net.nz](http://bayes.colling.net.nz).
